website_summaries.verdict: This is a quality, mid-level stick but best suited for defensive-minded players, particularly power players.
pros: It has a stiff design with defensive players in mind
It's durable, with technology aimed at hugging the ball well
cons: If you're not a power player, or if you're looking for a versatile, top-tier stick, this falls short of what you might get for top-dollar investment

customer_reviews.title: Good stick
customer_reviews.text: I used this stick for my junior and senior years of high school lacrosse as a defender. Really nice stick for the price. Not the easiest or my favorite stick in terms of tightening and staying legal but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Cam c

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in 6th grade and needed something a little more substantial at her level. I didn't want to pay for the super high level stick and found this stick to be a happy medium. It has a great design and the carbon fiber shaft or whatever it's made out of is nice and light. Definitely and upgrade over the $40-$60 cheapy sticks.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: excellent stick for the price
customer_reviews.text: This lax stick is listed as a girl's stick, but it is a perfect intermediate stick for middle school up to adult players. Lightweight, comfortable matte grip, flexible pocket for soft catching, and speedy plastic "runway" channels make it great for passing and shooting. Excellent stick for the price.
customer_reviews.author: cepluvskan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is fairly new to the sport. It last for a month before completely unraveling. strings broke completely off and were coming loose and she was always re-tightening it. don’t waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJean Papo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. Well made, shipped on time, and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hashey

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got the stick on time (actually a day early). The packaging was simple and there was signs of mishandling. The stick itself was exactly like the picture. The shaft is great really like the feel and its length. The head is good, make sure you break in your pocket. The one thing that I'm noticing is my strings are getting a bit fuzzy. When you burn the ends make sure you do correctly, you don't want the ends to keep fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R.

customer_reviews.title: ... on her JV team and she likes it just fine.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it on her JV team and she likes it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter has played all season on this stick and loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has played all season on this stick and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ira Hart

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s lacrosse skills improved immensely after we purchased this stick. She absolutely loves it and received many compliments from coaches and other players/parents after we invested in this stick.
customer_reviews.author: JMama

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and so did my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so did my daughter, for her first year playing Lacrosse it I is very easy to handle!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Baum Dental Studio Inc.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter wanted.. durable and very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: TINA ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: This one feels great, throws great and was affordable
customer_reviews.text: I just started coaching girls lax and needed a stick. This one feels great, throws great and was affordable. I like the $200 sticks, just not the price. This one works well for me as a coach. Since I have only used boys sticks before this I wanted to make sure I could show the team I was willing to use the same gear they do.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The netting is this broke after the about 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Duane L.

product_meta.title: STX Lacrosse Fortress 300 Girls Complete Stick
product_meta.description: STRENGTH FOR THE DEFENDER TO DOMINATE * Stiff design for defensive players * Runway Pocket is a unique, overlapping center string system that allows the two center runners to flex out and hug the ball * Includes new String Lock technology, which allows you to set your pocket to help prevent bagging * Elongated face increases power * STX Forward Cant * Raised ball-stop * Complete stick includes 7075 Shaft (graphite color)
feature_bullets: Runway pocket is a unique, Overlapping center string System that allows the two center runners to flex out and hug the ball
Includes new string lock technology, which allows you to set your pocket to help prevent bagging
